name: Shiva Baral
review: Delicious food with authentic flavors! Loved the Paneer Butter Masala and Malai Chamcham. Definitely coming back.

name: Ashwin Karki
review: Outstanding service and great ambiance. The Matar Paneer and Rasmalai are must-tries!

name: Sazan Bhujel
review: Visited Deurali Marwadi for the first time and was impressed by the variety of sweets. The Kanpuri Laddu and Peda were delightful.

name: Bishal Raj Poudel
review: As someone who loves Indian cuisine, I can say this place exceeded my expectations. The Rajma Masala and Special Dosa were phenomenal.

name: Sujal Poudel
review: Authentic Marwadi cuisine in a cozy setting. Loved the Aloo Palak and the variety of sweets available. Highly recommend!
